#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);

    while(t--)
    {
        double a,b,c;
        scanf("%lf%lf%lf",&a,&b,&c);

        double s = (a+b+c)/2;
        double k = sqrt(s*(s-a)*(s-b)*(s-c));
        double r = a*b*c/(4*k);

        printf("%.2lf\n",r);
    }
}
